ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentTicketPhoneCTI
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface. E. g. 'otrs/index.pl?Action=AgentTicketPhoneCTI;CallerID=XXX;MSN=XXX'.

ConfigItem.Name: CTI::MSN::Action::Map
ConfigItem.Description: Expert Setting - not needed in standard setup! Defines the Action based on MSN, e. g. route incoming calls to different frontend modules (Key=Number,Value=Frontend-Module e. g. Key=1222,Value=AgentTicketPhoneHotline).
